scripts.build: yarn run clean && babel src -d build --copy-files --source-maps inline
scripts.deploy:us: aws --region us-east-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name kodi-video-dev --zip-file fileb://package.zip
scripts.deploy:eu: aws --region eu-west-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name kodi-video-dev --zip-file fileb://package.zip
scripts.deploy-test:us: aws --region us-east-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name kodi-video-test --zip-file fileb://package.zip
scripts.deploy-test:eu: aws --region eu-west-1 lambda update-function-code --function-name kodi-video-test --zip-file fileb://package.zip
